General.Name: Nestle (Malaysia) Bhd
General.Description: Nestlé (Malaysia) Berhad manufactures and sells food and beverage products in Malaysia and internationally. The company offers ice-cream, powdered milk and drinks, liquid milk and juices, instant coffee and other beverages, chocolate confectionery products, instant noodles, culinary products, cereals, and related products. The company offers its products primarily under the Milo, Nescafé, Maggi, KitKat, Nestum, DRUMSTICK, MAT KOOL, NESTLÉ JUST MILK, Nestlé, NESTLÉ OMEGA PLUS, NESTLÉ CRUNCH, LACTOGROW, LACTOGROW Aktif, NESTLÉ EVERYDAY, NESPRAY and La Cremeria brands. The company was founded in 1912 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia. Nestlé (Malaysia) Berhad operates as a subsidiary of Nestlé S.A.
